Documentation

Installation

Install mdream globally using npm:

npm install -g mdream

CLI Usage

Generate llms.txt files from HTML:

mdream llms "dist/**/*.html" --site-name "My Site" --description "Site description"

Options

Option Description Default
--site-name Name of the site Required
--description Site description Required
--origin Origin URL Optional
--output Output directory .
--verbose Enable verbose logging false

Plugin System

mdream supports a powerful plugin system for customizing the conversion process.

Creating a Plugin

import { createPlugin } from 'mdream/plugins'

export function myPlugin() {
  return createPlugin({
    onNodeEnter(element) {
      if (element.name === 'custom-tag') {
        return '**Custom content:** '
      }
    }
  })
}

Performance

mdream is optimized for performance with V8 optimizations and streaming support for large files.
